channel.title: The Unofficial GameFAQs Podcast
channel.itunes:subtitle: Join us weekly as BlueMonk and members of GameFAQs.com discuss anything concerning games, the universe, and everything else.
channel.itunes:author: GFaqs Users
channel.itunes:summary: Join us weekly as BlueMonk and members of GameFAQs.com discuss anything concerning games, the universe, and everything else.

item.title: UGF Podcast- June 06 2008
item.description: Field of Mars, Burgess, and Emblem Boy join us on our first ever episode of the UGF Podcast. We sit down in front of our computers, open up Skype and let the discussions flow. We discuss MGS4, MyGames, Qore, and many other gaming related issues. Enjoy.
item.itunes:keywords: GameFAQs, Videogames, GameFAQs, PS3, Wii, Xbox 360, PC, PS2, Xbox, GameCube, PSP, GBA, DS, Wireless, Nintendo, Sony, Microsoft

item.title: UGF Podcast- June 13 2008
item.description: Happy Friday the 13th! Eemer03 and Field of Mars join me today in discussing Metal Gear, Final Fantasy, and Soul Calibur, among other things. Then we end the show in a "wishful" manner. Enjoy.
item.itunes:keywords: GameFAQs, Videogames, GameFAQs, PS3, Wii, Xbox 360, PC, PS2, Xbox, GameCube, PSP, GBA, DS, Wireless, Nintendo, Sony, Microsoft

item.title: UGF Podcast- June 20 2008
item.description: Happy Summer everyone! Field of Mars, J_Hook, and Swordmaster12 join us today on the UGF Podcast. In today's episode, we take some questions from the listeners and discuss FireFox. We end it with some news for all three consoles. Enjoy.
item.itunes:keywords: GameFAQs, Videogames, GameFAQs, PS3, Wii, Xbox 360, PC, PS2, Xbox, GameCube, PSP, GBA, DS, Wireless, Nintendo, Sony, Microsoft

item.title: UGF Podcast- July 04 2008
item.description: Field of Mars, Burgess, and J_Hook return in our extra long Independence Day episode. We answer some more questions, then talk about the week's big new announcements, including Diablo 3, Chrono Trigger for the DS, and Mega Man 9. Enjoy.
item.itunes:keywords: GameFAQs, Videogames, GameFAQs, PS3, Wii, Xbox 360, PC, PS2, Xbox, GameCube, PSP, GBA, DS, Wireless, Nintendo, Sony, Microsoft

item.title: UGF Podcast- July 11 2008
item.description: Field of Mars, Swordmaster12, Lil_Oni, and J_Hook join me in our epic 5-man podcast, featuring gangsta rap (no, that's not us). We talk about the ToU, Liv Tyler, rule 34, Liv Tyler, upcoming games, and end it with Liv Tyler. Enjoy.
item.itunes:keywords: GameFAQs, Videogames, GameFAQs, PS3, Wii, Xbox 360, PC, PS2, Xbox, GameCube, PSP, GBA, DS, Wireless, Nintendo, Sony, Microsoft

item.title: UGF Podcast- July 18 2008
item.description: Field of Mars, Burgess, and J_Hook join me in our super exciting E3 discussion extravaganza! We go over the expo's top events and talk about a massive overload of awesome (so awesome) games. Enjoy.
item.itunes:keywords: E3, GameFAQs, Videogames, GameFAQs, PS3, Wii, Xbox 360, PC, PS2, Xbox, GameCube, PSP, GBA, DS, Wireless, Nintendo, Sony, Microsoft

item.title: UGF Podcast- July 25 2008
item.description: Another Friday, another show. J_hook, Burgess and Fields_Of_Mars join me in the ongoing battle to conquer the internet podcast community. And with my (not so) brand new headset, that battle will go so much smoother. We discuss our GameFAQs history, Sega's continuous nonsense, and unnecessary laws. Enjoy.
item.itunes:keywords: E3, GameFAQs, Videogames, GameFAQs, PS3, Wii, Xbox 360, PC, PS2, Xbox, GameCube, PSP, GBA, DS, Wireless, Nintendo, Sony, Microsoft

item.title: UGF Podcast- August 01 2008
item.description: Happy August everyone! J_Hook, Burgess, and Bulzebe join me in more ranting and raving. Foam-mouthed and enraged, we talk about the internet, GameFAQs, music, and Denis Dyack. Enjoy.
item.itunes:keywords: GameFAQs, Videogames, GameFAQs, PS3, Wii, Xbox 360, PC, PS2, Xbox, GameCube, PSP, GBA, DS, Wireless, Nintendo, Sony, Microsoft

item.title: UGF Podcast- August 08 2008
item.description: It's Olympic time for the world, and for the UGF podcast too! J__Hook, Fields_of_Mars, and STRatoSTRafe join me in this week's show. We take some questions, and discuss SquareEnix's DKÎ£3713 event, some PC gaming news, and the future of digital distribution. Enjoy.
item.itunes:keywords: GameFAQs, Videogames, GameFAQs, PS3, Wii, Xbox 360, PC, PS2, Xbox, GameCube, PSP, GBA, DS, Wireless, Nintendo, Sony, Microsoft

item.title: UGF Podcast- August 15 2008
item.description: Sine! Cosine! Tangent! It's all about tangents in this week's episode of the UGF podcast. Join our misguided trio (including J__Hook and Lil_Oni) as they try to fight off and almost kill independent George. Enjoy.
item.itunes:keywords: GameFAQs, Videogames, GameFAQs, PS3, Wii, Xbox 360, PC, PS2, Xbox, GameCube, PSP, GBA, DS, Wireless, Nintendo, Sony, Microsoft

item.title: UGF Podcast- August 22 2008
item.description: So zetta slow! J__Hook, Burgess, and Lil_Oni join me in this week's episode. We challenge our musical memory in our special Music Trivia segment, then rant about Too Human and G4TV, and go over the week's news. Enjoy.
item.itunes:keywords: GameFAQs, Videogames, GameFAQs, PS3, Wii, Xbox 360, PC, PS2, Xbox, GameCube, PSP, GBA, DS, Wireless, Nintendo, Sony, Microsoft

item.title: UGF Podcast- August 29 2008
item.description: J__Hook and Burgess join me in this week's episode of the UGF podcast, where nothing goes wrong. We talk about hated parts of games we love, and how badly Shawn Johnson could beat you up. Enjoy.
item.itunes:keywords: GameFAQs, Videogames, GameFAQs, PS3, Wii, Xbox 360, PC, PS2, Xbox, GameCube, PSP, GBA, DS, Wireless, Nintendo, Sony, Microsoft
